item.description:
Dave Cormier
Karyl Lynch
Pelham West Associates
Tales from the Manufacturersâ€™ Side

Dave and Karyl will talk about their experiences as product scouts, focusing on the changes that have occurred for inventors as well as for distributors during the past 13 years. They will illustrate their talk with examples of products and licensing situations they have been involved with.
Pelham West Associates
matches products with client companies seeking specific categories of new products and provides new product evaluations for other client companies. The basis for their business has shifted over time as it has adapted to the changing marketplace. Dave and Karyl work on the side of the company licensing the products and not as agents or representatives for the inventor.
item.name: October Meeting
